Package Maths

Class Summary
AbstractMatrix Abstract implementation of a Matrix.
ArrayMaths Helpermethods to perform some frequently used operations on Arrays.
BandMatrix This implements a band Matrix with diagonales from top left to bottom right.
Convolution Convolution is the code for applying the convolution operator.
EquationSolver This helper class provides possibilities to solve linear equotations with different algorithms.
Matrix Implementation of AbstractMatrix as Default implementation.
Vector Representation of a vector with double values.
 

Enum Summary
EquationSolverAlgorithm Determines which Algorithm should be used to solve a system of equations.
 

Exception Summary
EquationSolverException Exception which is thrown if a system of equations is not solvable in the @see EquationSolver.
